title.narrative: Strengthening the Competitiveness of Small-Scale Cocoa Producers

description.narrative: The project will improve the quality of life for farmers and their families from Maya Q´eqchi communities by improving the productivity and quality of both their cocoa farms and their farmer organizations improving post harvest practices and business skills to improve incomes through increased prices for their cocoa. Participating families will directly benefit from: Improved technical assistance in cocoa through the training of 60 youth as community extension agents in the use of ICT tools for cocoa and as a new generation of cocoa farmers. Improved management practices on cocoa farms through better training, technical assistance and incorporation of ICT tools for cocoa farmers. Better availability of good genetic material for planting cocoa through the establishment of 6 clonal gardens with local elite materials. Improved consistency in the finished cocoa sold by the organizations through technical assistance and better equipment in processing centers. Improved business skills within their organizations to improve market access and returns to farmers through technical assistance and training for 6 farmer organizations.
